creator: Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
Ready to start your running & fitness activities? Lace up your running shoes and track distance, time, speed, elevation, calories burned and other stats with the adidas Running app.

JUST A FEW STEPS TO SUCCESS
1. Easy tracking in real time with built-in GPS — all your stats and your progress in one place
2. Customize the dashboard to your needs
3. Get audio feedback from the Voice Coach in the running app.
4. LIVE Tracking & Cheering: Let your friends know that you are out and about — receive custom cheers to motivate you to go even further!
5. Whether you want to aim for distance, duration or frequency, your personal goal is all about you. You can even choose whether to have a daily, weekly, monthly or yearly goal. Training for something specific? Set your personal goal for a target date of your choice!
6. Are you up for a challenge? We will help you maximize your motivation with targeted challenges.
7. Only thing that’s missing? A good shoe of course: Track miles for your running shoes & we’ll let you know when it’s time to get a new pair!

WORLDWIDE COMMUNITY
* Groups: Create a group and run with friends or join one of the many adidas Runners groups and be part of the many events!
* Engage in a little friendly competition & check the Leaderboard to see which of your friends has run the farthest.

PERFECT PARTNER
* Start an activity directly from your wrist. adidas Running is fully optimized for Android Wear 2.0
* Have a 3D look at your run afterwards by connecting your account to the Relive app.
* Runtastic is integrated with Garmin Connect (Garmin Forerunner, Fenix, GPS-enabled Vivo or Edge bike computer), Polar Flow and Google Fit.

Join the community & get inspired by millions of fellow fitness fans worldwide.

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
The adidas Running app is free to download and use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.

Do you have further questions about our apps? Contact us via https://help.runtastic.com/hc/en-u
descriptionShort: Your sports, cycling & running app with GPS tracker & training plans to stay fit

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Small changes can have a big impact! We've been doing a lot of work behind the scenes to improve existing functions in the app and to continue to make your experience better every chance we get.

4. LIVE Tracking & Cheering: Let your friends know that you are out and about — receive custom cheers to motivate you to go even further!
5. Whether you want to aim for distance, duration or frequency, your personal goal is all about you. You can even choose whether to have a daily, weekly, monthly or yearly goal. Training for something specific? Set your personal goal for a target date of your choice!
6. Are you up for a challenge? We will help you maximize your motivation with targeted challenges.
7. Only thing that’s missing? A good shoe of course: Track miles for your running shoes & we’ll let you know when it’s time to get a new pair!

WORLDWIDE COMMUNITY
* Groups: Create a group and run with friends or join one of the many adidas Runners groups and be part of the many events!
* Engage in a little friendly competition & check the Leaderboard to see which of your friends has run the farthest.

PERFECT PARTNER
* Start an activity directly from your wrist. adidas Running is fully optimized for Android Wear 2.0
* Have a 3D look at your run afterwards by connecting your account to the Relive app.
* Runtastic is integrated with Garmin Connect (Garmin Forerunner, Fenix, GPS-enabled Vivo or Edge bike computer), Polar Flow and Google Fit.

Join the community & get inspired by millions of fellow fitness fans worldwide.

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
The adidas Running app is free to download and use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.

Do you have further questions about our apps? Contact us via https://help.runtastic.com/hc/en-u
descriptionShort: Your running, cycling & sports app to track your workouts and weight loss 💪

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Sometimes you need that voice in your ear to inch you along to your end goal! We've improved the voice coach option, which tells you when you have achieved your workout goal. If you enable the voice coach and stop an activity, you'll be told if you don't reach your workout goal.

You can now also save your routes as a GPX file, which contains longitude and latitude location data.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Introducing the Ready to Run Virtual Race in adidas Running. On September 13, runners will face off virtually for a global race. Track a 5 km run and race against people from around the world! Go to the Community tab to sign up now!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: When it comes to deciding which of your favorite fitness apps to use, the choice just got easier! adidas Running plays well with others. We now allow our app to sync with apps such as Zwift, Suunto, Running Heroes, Keller Sports and Kinomap. Integrate your activity data into the app when you use these partners.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: When it comes to deciding which of your favorite fitness apps to use, the choice just got easier! adidas Running plays well with others. title: adidas Running App by Runtastic - Run Tracker

creator: Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
Ready to start your running & fitness activities? Whether you’re training for a 5k, a marathon, or exercising for weight loss, our fitness coach will help you achieve your goals. Track distance, time, speed, elevation, calories burned and other stats with the adidas Running app by Runtastic.

JUST A FEW STEPS TO SUCCESS
1. Easy tracking in real time with built-in GPS — all your stats and your progress in one place
2. Customize the dashboard to your needs
3. Get audio feedback from the Voice Coach in the running app.
4. LIVE Tracking & Cheering: Let your friends know that you are out and about — receive custom cheers to motivate you to go even further!
5. Whether you want to aim for distance, duration or frequency, your personal goal is all about you. You can even choose whether to have a daily, weekly, monthly or yearly goal. Training for something specific? Set your personal goal for a target date of your choice!
6. Are you up for a challenge? We will help you maximize your motivation with targeted challenges.
7. Only thing that’s missing? A good shoe of course: Track miles for your running shoes & we’ll let you know when it’s time to get a new pair!

WORLDWIDE COMMUNITY
* Groups: Create a group and run with friends or join one of the many adidas Runners groups and be part of the many events!
* Engage in a little friendly competition & check the Leaderboard to see which of your friends has run the farthest.

PERFECT PARTNER
* Start an activity directly from your wrist. adidas Running is fully optimized for Android Wear 2.0
* Have a 3D look at your run afterwards by connecting your account to the Relive app.
* Runtastic is integrated with Garmin Connect (Garmin Forerunner, Fenix, GPS-enabled Vivo or Edge bike computer), Polar Flow and Google Fit.

Join the community & get inspired by millions of fellow fitness fans worldwide.

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
The adidas Running app is free to download and use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.

Do you have further questions about our apps? Contact us via https://help.runtastic.com/hc/en-u

title: adidas Running - Workout, Sports & Run Tracker

creator: Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
Join over 170m people who have used adidas Running. Level up with our plans for 5k, 10k and marathon training. Map your runs and track minutes, miles and calories burned for over 120 activities. We’re more than just a run tracker. Take part in Challenges and Virtual Races will keep you on your toes and keep the competitive spirit alive. Create your own fitness community to motivate you and push you forward when you follow other users.

REASONS TO LOVE ADIDAS RUNNING

1. It’s FREE!
2. Our app features built-in GPS tracking - all your workout statistics and your progress are in one place
3. Track duration, calories burned, monitor heart rate data and more for over 120 activities like yoga, cycling, walking and bodyweight training
4. Participate in Virtual Races to compete globally. Race against people from around the world and earn Badges!
5. Score activity Records when you reach a new personal best
6. Goal Setting: Whether you want to aim for distance, duration or weight loss, your personal goal is all about you. Choose a daily, weekly, monthly or yearly goal
7. Ready to push yourself? We will help you maximize your motivation with targeted challenges

CREATE YOUR OWN FITNESS COMMUNITY

- Followers: stay connected to the running community and keep your competitive spirit alive
- Newsfeed: get updated and motivated through our regular fitness content/blog posts, your followers' activities and events around your location


CONNECT WITH OTHER FITNESS APPS

- Partners: we're compatible with My Fitness Pal, Suunto, Kinomap, Running Heroes, Keller Sports, Polar, and Garmin Connect (Garmin Forerunner, Fenix, GPS-enabled Vivo or Edge bike computer)
- Create breathtaking videos of your fitness adventure when you use the Relive app


Unleash your full potential: with Premium Membership you'll unlock all Premium features in adidas Running & adidas Training, including our different training plans

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
The adidas Running app is free to download and use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Inspiration leads to motivation. You can now make your profile public to let others see your progress and updates! Build up your following easily and create a fitness community to support you all the way to the finish line.

Start a challenge right away with the new Let's Go button on the challenge screen.

We now sync with the TrainasOne app, The Conqueror Challenges and RunMotion Coach offering you even more ways to get active with adidas Running. Check it out!

title: adidas Running App - Your Sports & Run Tracker

creator: Adidas Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
Ready to start your running & fitness activities? Whether you’re training for a 5k, a marathon, or exercising for weight loss, our fitness coach will help you achieve your goals. Track distance, time, speed, elevation, calories burned and other stats with the adidas Running app by Runtastic.

JUST A FEW STEPS TO SUCCESS
1. Easy tracking in real time with built-in GPS — all your stats and your progress in one place
2. Customize the dashboard to your needs
3. Get audio feedback from the Voice Coach in the running app.
4. LIVE Tracking & Cheering: Let your friends know that you are out and about — receive custom cheers to motivate you to go even further!
5. Whether you want to aim for distance, duration or frequency, your personal goal is all about you. You can even choose whether to have a daily, weekly, monthly or yearly goal. Training for something specific? Set your personal goal for a target date of your choice!
6. Are you up for a challenge? We will help you maximize your motivation with targeted challenges.
7. Only thing that’s missing? A good shoe of course: Track miles for your running shoes & we’ll let you know when it’s time to get a new pair!

WORLDWIDE COMMUNITY
* Groups: Create a group and run with friends or join one of the many adidas Runners groups and be part of the many events!
* Engage in a little friendly competition & check the Leaderboard to see which of your friends has run the farthest.

PERFECT PARTNER
* Start an activity directly from your wrist. adidas Running is fully optimized for Android Wear 2.0
* Have a 3D look at your run afterwards by connecting your account to the Relive app.
* Runtastic is integrated with Garmin Connect (Garmin Forerunner, Fenix, GPS-enabled Vivo or Edge bike computer), Polar Flow and Google Fit.

Join the community & get inspired by millions of fellow fitness fans worldwide.

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
The adidas Running app is free to download and use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.

Do you have further questions about our apps? Contact us via https://help.runtastic.com/hc/en-us

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Express yourself! You can now write a bio on your adidas Running profile to tell your followers more about you.

You can now filter through different sport types in the statistics overview section on the Progress tab for a quicker look at your data.

Stay on your game with Goals. Your tracked activities from the adidas Training app now count towards your exercise goals in the Progress tab.

Your maps got an upgrade, too. Choose from a new map style when you share your activity.

title: adidas Running App - Your Sports & Run Tracker

creator: Adidas Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
Ready to start your running & fitness activities? Whether you’re training for a 5k, a marathon, or exercising for weight loss, our fitness coach will help you achieve your goals. Track distance, time, speed, elevation, calories burned and other stats with the adidas Running app by Runtastic.

JUST A FEW STEPS TO SUCCESS
1. Easy tracking in real time with built-in GPS — all your stats and your progress in one place
2. Customize the dashboard to your needs
3. Get audio feedback from the Voice Coach in the running app.
4. LIVE Tracking & Cheering: Let your friends know that you are out and about — receive custom cheers to motivate you to go even further!
5. Whether you want to aim for distance, duration or frequency, your personal goal is all about you. You can even choose whether to have a daily, weekly, monthly or yearly goal. Training for something specific? Set your personal goal for a target date of your choice!
6. Are you up for a challenge? We will help you maximize your motivation with targeted challenges.
7. Only thing that’s missing? A good shoe of course: Track miles for your running shoes & we’ll let you know when it’s time to get a new pair!

WORLDWIDE COMMUNITY
* Groups: Create a group and run with friends or join one of the many adidas Runners groups and be part of the many events!
* Engage in a little friendly competition & check the Leaderboard to see which of your friends has run the farthest.

PERFECT PARTNER
* Start an activity directly from your wrist. adidas Running is fully optimized for Android Wear 2.0
* Have a 3D look at your run afterwards by connecting your account to the Relive app.
* Runtastic is integrated with Garmin Connect (Garmin Forerunner, Fenix, GPS-enabled Vivo or Edge bike computer), Polar Flow and Google Fit.

Join the community & get inspired by millions of fellow fitness fans worldwide.

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
The adidas Running app is free to download and use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.

Do you have further questions about our apps? Contact us via https://help.runtastic.com/hc/en-us

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Your brand-new Feed is here! Show off your hard work every time you use our app—your workouts, including maps and summaries, will be shown to your followers in the feed. Add photos and notes to make your activities stand out.

Need some fit-spiration? Like and comment on people's posts to stay active and engaged in your online fitness community. You'll also get our latest blog posts on exercise, nutrition, lifestyle and more!

title: adidas Running App - Your Sports & Run Tracker

creator: Adidas Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
Ready to start your running & fitness activities? Whether you’re training for a 5k, a marathon, or exercising for weight loss, our fitness coach will help you achieve your goals. Track distance, time, speed, elevation, calories burned and other stats with the adidas Running app by Runtastic.

JUST A FEW STEPS TO SUCCESS
1. Easy tracking in real time with built-in GPS — all your stats and your progress in one place
2. Customize the dashboard to your needs
3. Get audio feedback from the Voice Coach in the running app.
4. LIVE Tracking & Cheering: Let your friends know that you are out and about — receive custom cheers to motivate you to go even further!
5. Whether you want to aim for distance, duration or frequency, your personal goal is all about you. You can even choose whether to have a daily, weekly, monthly or yearly goal. Training for something specific? Set your personal goal for a target date of your choice!
6. Are you up for a challenge? We will help you maximize your motivation with targeted challenges.
7. Only thing that’s missing? A good shoe of course: Track miles for your running shoes & we’ll let you know when it’s time to get a new pair!

WORLDWIDE COMMUNITY
* Groups: Create a group and run with friends or join one of the many adidas Runners groups and be part of the many events!
* Engage in a little friendly competition & check the Leaderboard to see which of your friends has run the farthest.

PERFECT PARTNER
* Start an activity directly from your wrist. adidas Running is fully optimized for Android Wear 2.0
* Have a 3D look at your run afterwards by connecting your account to the Relive app.
* Runtastic is integrated with Garmin Connect (Garmin Forerunner, Fenix, GPS-enabled Vivo or Edge bike computer), Polar Flow and Google Fit.

Join the community & get inspired by millions of fellow fitness fans worldwide.

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
The adidas Running app is free to download and use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.

Do you have further questions about our apps? Contact us via https://help.runtastic.com/hc/en-us

2. Built-in GPS tracking
3. Track duration, distance, calories burned, and monitor heart rate data.
4. The ultimate sports app: choose yoga, hiking, cycling, and more.
5. Take on Virtual Races to race with athletes around the world.
5. Score activity Records when you hit a new milestone
6. Distance, duration or consistency: choose a personal goal for the sport of your choice.

Ready to push yourself? We will help you maximize your motivation with targeted challenges

CREATE YOUR OWN FITNESS COMMUNITY
- Followers: stay connected to the running community and keep your competitive spirit alive
- Newsfeed: get updated and motivated through our blog posts on fitness topics, your followers' activities and events around your location

CONNECT WITH OTHER FITNESS APPS
- Partners: we're compatible with apps Suunto, Kinomap, Running Heroes, Keller Sports, Zwift, Polar, Coros, Garmin Connect, Nolio,
RunMotion Coach, Xhale, TrainasONE
- Keep an eye on your hydration and diet with REBO Smart Bottle and My Fitness Pal
- Join challenges with our partners: Vitality Running World Cup, Smashrun, The Conqueror Challenges
- Earn rewards when you connect to Running Heroes, Keller sMiles
- Use the adidas Running app on your Wear OS watch to track activities, complete challenges, and check your stats.
- Keep an eye on your vitals, steps and more with Google Fit and Huawei Health

PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP BENEFITS
With Premium, you’ll unlock:
- Personalized training plans for races (weight loss, 5K, 10K, half-marathon, marathon)
- Interval training for running, walking and cycling
- Personal records to mark all your achievements
- Auto-pause when you stop moving

Your Premium Membership is for the adidas Training app too!

STILL WANT MORE?

Unlock adidas rewards with the Creators Club loyalty program. Collect points for challenges and activities that you can redeem for early access to products, free Premium, events, and more.

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
The adidas Running app is free to download and use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.

title: adidas Running Tracker Run App

creator: Adidas Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
Ready to start your running & fitness activities? Whether you’re training for a 5k, a marathon, or exercising for weight loss, our fitness coach will help you achieve your goals. Track distance, time, speed, elevation, calories burned and other stats with the adidas Running app by Runtastic.

JUST A FEW STEPS TO SUCCESS
1. Easy tracking in real time with built-in GPS — all your stats and your progress in one place
2. Customize the dashboard to your needs
3. Get audio feedback from the Voice Coach in the running app.
4. LIVE Tracking & Cheering: Let your friends know that you are out and about — receive custom cheers to motivate you to go even further!
5. Whether you want to aim for distance, duration or frequency, your personal goal is all about you. You can even choose whether to have a daily, weekly, monthly or yearly goal. Training for something specific? Set your personal goal for a target date of your choice!
6. Are you up for a challenge? We will help you maximize your motivation with targeted challenges.
7. Only thing that’s missing? A good shoe of course: Track miles for your running shoes & we’ll let you know when it’s time to get a new pair!

WORLDWIDE COMMUNITY
* Groups: Create a group and run with friends or join one of the many adidas Runners groups and be part of the many events!
* Engage in a little friendly competition & check the Leaderboard to see which of your friends has run the farthest.

PERFECT PARTNER
* Start an activity directly from your wrist. adidas Running is fully optimized for Android Wear 2.0
* Have a 3D look at your run afterwards by connecting your account to the Relive app.
* Runtastic is integrated with Garmin Connect (Garmin Forerunner, Fenix, GPS-enabled Vivo or Edge bike computer), Polar Flow and Google Fit.

Join the community & get inspired by millions of fellow fitness fans worldwide.

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
The adidas Running app is free to download and use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. title: adidas Running Tracker Run App

creator: Adidas Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
Ready to start your running & fitness activities? Whether you’re training for a 5k, a marathon, or exercising for weight loss, our fitness coach will help you achieve your goals. Track distance, time, speed, elevation, calories burned and other stats with the adidas Running app by Runtastic.

JUST A FEW STEPS TO SUCCESS
1. Easy tracking in real time with built-in GPS — all your stats and your progress in one place
2. Customize the dashboard to your needs
3. Get audio feedback from the Voice Coach in the running app.
4. LIVE Tracking & Cheering: Let your friends know that you are out and about — receive custom cheers to motivate you to go even further!
5. Whether you want to aim for distance, duration or frequency, your personal goal is all about you. You can even choose whether to have a daily, weekly, monthly or yearly goal. Training for something specific? Set your personal goal for a target date of your choice!
6. Are you up for a challenge? We will help you maximize your motivation with targeted challenges.
7. Only thing that’s missing? A good shoe of course: Track miles for your running shoes & we’ll let you know when it’s time to get a new pair!

WORLDWIDE COMMUNITY
* Groups: Create a group and run with friends or join one of the many adidas Runners groups and be part of the many events!
* Engage in a little friendly competition & check the Leaderboard to see which of your friends has run the farthest.

PERFECT PARTNER
* Start an activity directly from your wrist. adidas Running is fully optimized for Android Wear 2.0
* Have a 3D look at your run afterwards by connecting your account to the Relive app.
* Runtastic is integrated with Garmin Connect (Garmin Forerunner, Fenix, GPS-enabled Vivo or Edge bike computer), Polar Flow and Google Fit.

Join the community & get inspired by millions of fellow fitness fans worldwide.

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
The adidas Running app is free to download and use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.

Do you have further questions about our apps? Contact us via https://help.runtastic.com/hc/en-us
descriptionShort: Boost your energy and beat fatigue by joining our virtual sports challenge ⚡

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Check out our updated Live Tracking feature for your next run, hike or other sport! Turn on Live Tracking while you do an activity and your followers can send Cheers.

You can share your location to let your fitness community follow you and keep you motivated in real time.

Not following anyone yet? Discover users to connect with on the News Feed or Profile tab.

title: adidas Running Tracker Run App

creator: Adidas Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
Make your new years’ resolution to become fitter a reality with adidas running & fitness tracker! The leading exercise & activity tracker to log all your fitness activities in one place. Track your activities to meet your fitness goals & running achievements!

STAY MOTIVATED | TRACK YOUR PROGRESS | CONNECT WITH OTHERS!
Join over 170m people who use adidas running & fitness tracker frequently to log & monitor their fitness activities & exercise routines for walking, hiking, cycling, running & many other sports. We're more than just a run & distance tracker. With regular challenges & virtual races, you'll always be motivated. Keep a log of minutes, miles & calories burned — see your statistics. Download adidas running as your run buddy which is completely free & modifiable according to your needs!

9 REASONS TO LOVE ADIDAS RUNNING
1. Running app & fitness activity tracker built for beginners, experienced runners & athletes!
2. Keep track of all your sports activities for free!
3. Built-in GPS tracking, pedometer & step tracker for accurately tracking distance & performance indicators such as pace, calories etc. on your runs, walks, other cardio workouts & sports!
4. Track duration, distance, calories burned, & monitor heart rate data.
5. The ultimate sports tracker: Select more than 90 sports incl. yoga, hiking, cycling etc to monitor, track your progress & accomplish your fitness goals.
6. Participate in virtual races & race at your own pace. Run together with thousands of adidas running users from around the world!
7. Distance, duration or consistency: Choose a personal goal (weight loss, 5k, 10k, half marathon, marathon) for running or the sport of your choice.
8. Your fitness community: keep your competitive spirit alive by connecting with others!
9. Health tips & fitness newsfeed: get updated & motivated through our blog posts on fitness topics, your followers' activities & events around your location

THE ULTIMATE DISTANCE & FITNESS TRACKER FOR SPORTS, WALKING, JOGGING, CYCLING & RUNNING

Start running as a beginner & easily track your progress. Go from couch-to-5k in no time! With live GPS tracking & pedometer, you will be able to accurately track your runs, jogs, walks or when cycling. Additionally, you can log more than 90 sports activities such as cricket, yoga, swimming, within adidas running for free! Use the adidas Running app on your Wear OS watch to track activities, complete challenges & check your stats. Monitor your heart rate, vitals, steps & more with Google Fit & Huawei Health

PREMIUM BENEFITS:
- Personalized training plans for races (weight loss, 5K, 10K, half-marathon, marathon)
- Interval training for running, walking & cycling
- Personal records to mark all your achievements
- Auto-pause when you stop moving
- Premium membership for adidas training app

MARATHON / HALF MARATHON TRAINING (premium)
With its accurate pedometer & distance tracker, voice prompts for average pace, calories, nutrition alerts all you need to focus on is your run & energy. adidas running & fitness tracker is a great running buddy for improving performance & building endurance for marathon training. Download adidas running & build your own marathon training plan!

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
The adidas Running app is free to download & use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.

creator: Adidas Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
ULTIMATE HEALTH & FITNESS TOOL FOR SPORTS, EXERCISE & RUNNING

Join the fitness revolution with adidas Running, the complete exercise tracker to log multiple sports in one place. Track your cardio such as running, walking, cycling, swimming, etc and also other sports like football, basketball, tennis & much more. There are more than 90 sports activities & exercise routines that you can track with adidas Running!

STAY MOTIVATED | TRACK MULTIPLE SPORTS | SOCIALIZE

We're more than just a run & distance tracker! There are over 170m people who use adidas Running - run tracker frequently to log their sport & fitness activities & exercise routines for walking, cycling, running & many other sports.

WE ARE SOCIAL: With regular challenges & virtual races, you'll always be motivated. Train for the next marathon or half marathon while being motivated by athletes around you! Keep a log of minutes, track your pace, miles & calories burned. Get better as you go, follow other athletes & join sport clubs around you to keep yourself motivated!

7 REASONS TO LOVE ADIDAS RUNNING

1. YOUR TRAINING PLAN: Create your Run plan according to distance, duration, or consistency: Choose a personal goal (weight loss, 5k, 10k, half marathon, marathon, etc) for running or the sport of your choice.

2. ACCURACY: Built-in GPS tracking, pedometer track distance of your cardio workouts including indicators such as pace, calories, cadence etc.

3. FITNESS STATS: Track duration, distance, calories burned, and monitor heart rate data.

4. SOCIAL SPARK: Participate in virtual races & competitions. Run together with thousands of adidas Running users & join adidas causes around the world!

5. TRACK MULTIPLE SPORTS: Select more than 90 sports incl. gymnastics, football, tennis, cycling, track & accomplish your fitness goals.

6. ALL IN ONE SPORT ACTIVITY APP FOR FREE: Running app & sport activity tracker built for beginners, experienced runners & athletes!

7. DAILY HEALTH & FITNESS TIPS: Get updated & motivated through our blog posts on fitness topics, your followers' activities & events around your location

- Personalized training & run plans (weight loss, half-marathon, marathon)
- Training for interval running, walking & cycling
- Personal records & running achievements
- Auto-pause when you stop moving
- Premium membership for adidas training app

Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. ULTIMATE HEALTH & FITNESS TRACKER FOR SPORTS & RUNNING

Join the fitness revolution with adidas Running, the complete sports, fitness & activity tracker to log multiple sports in one place. Track your cardio workouts such as running, walking, jogging, biking, swimming and other sports. There are more than 90 sports activities that you can track with adidas Running!

**Available on mobile and Wear OS!

STAY MOTIVATED | TRACK MULTIPLE SPORTS & FITNESS ACTIVITIES | SOCIALIZE

There are over 170m people who use adidas Running: sport, fitness & activity tracker frequently to log their fitness activities & workout routines for walking, cycling, running & many other sports. We're more than just a run & distance tracker. With regular challenges & virtual races, you'll always be motivated. Keep a log of minutes, km & calories burned & see your statistics. Get better as you go, follow other athletes & join sport clubs around you to keep yourself motivated!

8 REASONS TO LOVE ADIDAS RUNNING

1. YOUR TRAINING PLAN: Create your Run plan according to distance, duration or consistency: Choose a personal goal (weight loss, 5k, 10k, half marathon, marathon etc) for running or the sport of your choice.

2. ACCURACY: Built-in GPS tracking, pedometer track distance of your cardio workouts including indicators such as pace, calories, cadence, etc.

3. FITNESS STATS: Track duration, distance, calories burned, and monitor heart rate data (Wear OS) with all your workouts.

4. SOCIAL SPARK: Participate in virtual races & competitions. Run together with thousands of adidas Running users.

5. TRACK MULTIPLE SPORTS: Select more than 90 sports incl. hiking & cycling to track & accomplish your fitness goals.

6. ALL IN ONE SPORT ACTIVITY APP FOR FREE: Running app & sport activity tracker built for beginners, experienced runners & athletes!

7. DAILY HEALTH & FITNESS TIPS: Get updated & motivated through our blog posts on fitness topics, your followers' activities & events around your location

8. CONNECT YOUR DEVICES: Add adidas running to devices like Garmin Connect, Google fit & Wear OS.

THE ULTIMATE DISTANCE, RUN & FITNESS TRACKER FOR SPORTS, WALKING, JOGGING, CYCLING & RUNNING

Become a 5k Runner in no time! Track your progress. Go from couch-to-5k with personal training plans! With the live GPS tracking & pedometer, you will be able to accurately track your runs, jogs, walks, or when cycling. Additionally, you can log your sports activity on mobile & Wear OS for more than 90 sports within adidas running for free!

TRAINER FOR MARATHON & HALF MARATHON TRAINING (premium)

With its accurate pedometer, distance tracker & run coach all you need to focus on is your run & energy. Get adidas Running: Sport, Activity & fitness tracker is great for improving performance & building endurance for marathon training. Download adidas running & build your own marathon training plan! Connect with Wear OS devices!

PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP BENEFITS:

- Personalized training & run plans for races (weight loss, 5K, 10K, half-marathon, marathon training)

- Interval training for running, walking & cycling - Train with your personal run coach & trainer!

- Personal records to mark all your achievements

- Auto-pause when you stop moving

- Premium membership for adidas training app

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS

The adidas Running app by Runtastic is free to download & use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.

title: adidas Running - Run Tracker

creator: Adidas Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
Ready to start your running & fitness activities? Whether you’re training for a 5k, a marathon, or exercising for weight loss, our fitness coach will help you achieve your goals. Track distance, time, speed, elevation, calories burned and other stats with the adidas Running app by Runtastic.

JUST A FEW STEPS TO SUCCESS
1. Easy tracking in real time with built-in GPS — all your stats and your progress in one place
2. Customize the dashboard to your needs
3. Get audio feedback from the Voice Coach in the running app.
4. LIVE Tracking & Cheering: Let your friends know that you are out and about — receive custom cheers to motivate you to go even further!
5. Whether you want to aim for distance, duration or frequency, your personal goal is all about you. You can even choose whether to have a daily, weekly, monthly or yearly goal. Training for something specific? Set your personal goal for a target date of your choice!
6. Are you up for a challenge? We will help you maximize your motivation with targeted challenges.
7. Only thing that’s missing? A good shoe of course: Track miles for your running shoes & we’ll let you know when it’s time to get a new pair!

WORLDWIDE COMMUNITY
* Groups: Create a group and run with friends or join one of the many adidas Runners groups and be part of the many events!
* Engage in a little friendly competition & check the Leaderboard to see which of your friends has run the farthest.

PERFECT PARTNER
* Start an activity directly from your wrist. adidas Running is fully optimized for Android Wear 2.0
* Have a 3D look at your run afterwards by connecting your account to the Relive app.
* Runtastic is integrated with Garmin Connect (Garmin Forerunner, Fenix, GPS-enabled Vivo or Edge bike computer), Polar Flow and Google Fit.

Join the community & get inspired by millions of fellow fitness fans worldwide.

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
The adidas Running app is free to download and use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.

Do you have further questions about our apps? Contact us via https://help.runtastic.com/hc/en-us
descriptionShort: Boost your energy and beat fatigue by joining our virtual sports challenge

title: adidas Running - Run Tracker

creator: Adidas Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
ULTIMATE HEALTH & FITNESS TRACKER FOR CARDIO, SPORTS & RUNNING

Join the fitness community with adidas Running, the complete sports, fitness & activity tracker to log multiple sports in one place. Track your cardio such as running, walking, cycling, swimming, etc and also other sports. There are more than 90 sports activities that you can track with adidas Running!

**Available on mobile, Wear OS among other wearable devices

STAY MOTIVATED | TRACK MULTIPLE SPORTS & FITNESS ACTIVITIES | SOCIALIZE

There are over 170m people who use adidas Running: sport, fitness & activity tracker frequently to log their fitness activities & exercise routines for walking, cycling, running & many other sports. We're more than just a run & distance tracker. With regular challenges & virtual races, you'll always be motivated. Keep a log of minutes, km & calories burned & see your statistics. Get better as you go, follow other athletes & join sport clubs around you to keep yourself motivated!

8 REASONS TO LOVE ADIDAS RUNNING

1. YOUR TRAINING PLAN: Create your Run plan according to distance, duration or consistency: Choose a personal goal (weight loss, 5k, 10k, half marathon, marathon etc) for running or the sport of your choice.

2. ACCURACY: Built-in GPS tracking, pedometer track distance of your cardio workouts including indicators such as pace, calories, cadence etc.

3. FITNESS STATS: Track duration, distance, calories burned, and monitor heart rate data (Wear OS)

4. SOCIAL SPARK: Participate in virtual races & competitions. Run together with thousands of adidas Running users.

5. TRACK MULTIPLE SPORTS: Select more than 90 sports incl. hiking, cycling, track & accomplish your fitness goals.

6. ALL IN ONE SPORT ACTIVITY APP FOR FREE: Running app & sport activity tracker built for beginners, experienced runners & athletes!

7. DAILY HEALTH & FITNESS TIPS: Get updated & motivated through our blog posts on fitness topics, your followers' activities & events around your location

8. CONNECT YOUR DEVICES: Integrate adidas running with devices like Garmin Connect, Google fit, and Wear OS.

THE ULTIMATE DISTANCE & RUN-TRACKER FOR SPORTS, WALKING, JOGGING, CYCLING & RUNNING

Start with running as a beginner and easily track your progress. Go from couch-to-5k in no time! With live GPS tracking & pedometer, you will be able to accurately track your runs, jogs, walks or when cycling. Additionally, you can log your sports activity on mobile & Wear OS for more than 90 sports within adidas running for free!

TRAINER FOR MARATHON & HALF MARATHON TRAINING (premium)

With its accurate pedometer, distance tracker & run coach all you need to focus on is your run & energy. Get adidas Running: Sport, Activity & fitness tracker is great for improving performance & building endurance for marathon training. Download adidas running & build your own marathon training plan!

PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP BENEFITS:

- Personalized training & run plans for races (weight loss, 5K, 10K, half-marathon, marathon)

- Interval training for running, walking & cycling - Train with your personal run coach & trainer!

- Personal records to mark all your achievements

- Auto-pause when you stop moving

- Premium membership for adidas training app

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS

The adidas Running app by Runtastic is free to download & use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. title: adidas Running - Run Tracker

creator: Adidas Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
Ready to start your running & fitness activities? Whether you’re training for a 5k, a marathon, or exercising for weight loss, our fitness coach will help you achieve your goals. Track distance, time, speed, elevation, calories burned and other stats with the adidas Running app by Runtastic.

JUST A FEW STEPS TO SUCCESS
1. Easy tracking in real time with built-in GPS — all your stats and your progress in one place
2. Customize the dashboard to your needs
3. Get audio feedback from the Voice Coach in the running app.
4. LIVE Tracking & Cheering: Let your friends know that you are out and about — receive custom cheers to motivate you to go even further!
5. Whether you want to aim for distance, duration or frequency, your personal goal is all about you. You can even choose whether to have a daily, weekly, monthly or yearly goal. Training for something specific? Set your personal goal for a target date of your choice!
6. Are you up for a challenge? We will help you maximize your motivation with targeted challenges.
7. Only thing that’s missing? A good shoe of course: Track miles for your running shoes & we’ll let you know when it’s time to get a new pair!

WORLDWIDE COMMUNITY
* Groups: Create a group and run with friends or join one of the many adidas Runners groups and be part of the many events!
* Engage in a little friendly competition & check the Leaderboard to see which of your friends has run the farthest.

PERFECT PARTNER
* Start an activity directly from your wrist. adidas Running is fully optimized for Android Wear 2.0
* Have a 3D look at your run afterwards by connecting your account to the Relive app.
* Runtastic is integrated with Garmin Connect (Garmin Forerunner, Fenix, GPS-enabled Vivo or Edge bike computer), Polar Flow and Google Fit.

Join the community & get inspired by millions of fellow fitness fans worldwide.

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
The adidas Running app is free to download and use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.

Do you have further questions about our apps? Contact us via https://help.runtastic.com/hc/en-us
descriptionShort: Boost your energy and beat fatigue by joining our virtual sports challenge

title: adidas Running - Run Tracker

creator: Adidas Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
Ready to start your running & fitness activities? Whether you’re training for a 5k, a marathon, or exercising for weight loss, our fitness coach will help you achieve your goals. Track distance, time, speed, elevation, calories burned and other stats with the adidas Running app by Runtastic.

JUST A FEW STEPS TO SUCCESS
1. Easy tracking in real time with built-in GPS — all your stats and your progress in one place
2. Customize the dashboard to your needs
3. Get audio feedback from the Voice Coach in the running app.
4. LIVE Tracking & Cheering: Let your friends know that you are out and about — receive custom cheers to motivate you to go even further!
5. Whether you want to aim for distance, duration or frequency, your personal goal is all about you. You can even choose whether to have a daily, weekly, monthly or yearly goal. Training for something specific? Set your personal goal for a target date of your choice!
6. Are you up for a challenge? We will help you maximize your motivation with targeted challenges.
7. Only thing that’s missing? A good shoe of course: Track miles for your running shoes & we’ll let you know when it’s time to get a new pair!

WORLDWIDE COMMUNITY
* Groups: Create a group and run with friends or join one of the many adidas Runners groups and be part of the many events!
* Engage in a little friendly competition & check the Leaderboard to see which of your friends has run the farthest.

PERFECT PARTNER
* Start an activity directly from your wrist. adidas Running is fully optimized for Android Wear 2.0
* Have a 3D look at your run afterwards by connecting your account to the Relive app.
* Runtastic is integrated with Garmin Connect (Garmin Forerunner, Fenix, GPS-enabled Vivo or Edge bike computer), Polar Flow and Google Fit.

Join the community & get inspired by millions of fellow fitness fans worldwide.

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
The adidas Running app is free to download and use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.

Do you have further questions about our apps? Contact us via https://help.runtastic.com/hc/en-us
descriptionShort: Boost your energy and beat fatigue by joining our virtual sports challenge

THE APP FOR ALL ACTIVITIES

title:
adidas Running: Run & Work Out
13.25

creator: Adidas Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
Ready to start your running & fitness activities? Whether you’re training for a 5k, a marathon, or exercising for weight loss, our fitness coach will help you achieve your goals. Track distance, time, speed, elevation, calories burned and other stats with the adidas Running app by Runtastic.

JUST A FEW STEPS TO SUCCESS
1. Easy tracking in real time with built-in GPS — all your stats and your progress in one place
2. Customize the dashboard to your needs
3. Get audio feedback from the Voice Coach in the running app.
4. LIVE Tracking & Cheering: Let your friends know that you are out and about — receive custom cheers to motivate you to go even further!
5. Whether you want to aim for distance, duration or frequency, your personal goal is all about you. You can even choose whether to have a daily, weekly, monthly or yearly goal. Training for something specific? Set your personal goal for a target date of your choice!
6. Are you up for a challenge? We will help you maximize your motivation with targeted challenges.
7. Only thing that’s missing? A good shoe of course: Track miles for your running shoes & we’ll let you know when it’s time to get a new pair!

WORLDWIDE COMMUNITY
* Groups: Create a group and run with friends or join one of the many adidas Runners groups and be part of the many events!
* Engage in a little friendly competition & check the Leaderboard to see which of your friends has run the farthest.

PERFECT PARTNER
* Start an activity directly from your wrist. adidas Running is fully optimized for Android Wear 2.0
* Have a 3D look at your run afterwards by connecting your account to the Relive app.
* Runtastic is integrated with Garmin Connect (Garmin Forerunner, Fenix, GPS-enabled Vivo or Edge bike computer), Polar Flow and Google Fit.

Join the community & get inspired by millions of fellow fitness fans worldwide.

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
The adidas Running app is free to download and use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.

Do you have further questions about our apps? Contact us via https://help.runtastic.com/hc/en-us
descriptionShort: Boost your energy and beat fatigue by joining our virtual sports challenge

creator: Adidas Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
Join the fitness community with adidas Running, the complete sports, fitness and activity tracker to log multiple sports seamlessly. adidas Running is the perfect all-in-one run tracker, biking companion, and workout app. Discover more than 90 sports and activities that you can track when you download adidas Running today!

Join over 170m people who use adidas Running every day for their walks, runs, and overall fitness. Track your fitness activity with ease as you complete your exercise routines, marathon training or cycling trips.

Reach your fitness goals by staying motivated through regular challenges and virtual races.

Keep a log of minutes, km and calories burned and see your statistics. Get better as you go, follow other athletes and join sport clubs around you to keep yourself moving!

Download adidas Running today for the ultimate running app, bike tracker, and overall fitness companion.

adidas Running Features

THE APP FOR ALL ACTIVITIES
- Choose from 90+ sports and activities
- Hike, walk, run and more - Take adidas Running for any activity
- Monitor your fitness and log your heart rate with our health monitor
- Sport and activity goals are in reach with adidas Running

ACTIVITY & RUN TRACKER
- Track walks, cycling trips, and even your next hike
- Monitor health and fitness with a heart rate, pace, cadence and calorie tracker
- Track your fitness and check progress as you improve
- Enjoy convenient running app features as you plan run distance, duration, and consistency

WEAR OS COMPATIBILITY
- Link your adidas Running account to your favorite wearable device for a personal health monitor
- Weight loss and daily fitness progress monitoring at your disposal
- Improve overall health and fitness with convenient insight on all your devices

HALF-MARATHON & MARATHON TRAINING (PREMIUM)
- With a running coach and detailed tools, you can focus on the run that matters
- Walk to Run adidas Training Plan adapts to your level so you can prepare for the next 5K
- Build a running plan that's personalized to your needs - available to all members

MORE PREMIUM BENEFITS
- Run plans for 5k, 10k, marathons or weight loss. Receive personalized training for races
- Personal running coach - Interval training for running, walking and cycling
- Personal records to mark all your achievements
- Auto-pause when you stop moving

**Available on mobile, Wear OS, and other wearable devices. Two tiles are supported in Wear OS: a statistics tile to see your progress over the past six months and a launch tile to quick start a specific sport type. We also support three different complications: Start Activity, Weekly Distance, and Number of Weekly Activities.

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS

The adidas Running app by Runtastic is free to download & use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.
descriptionShort: Start running & biking this season with fitness training plans for 5k & more

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We've added over 1600 new shoe models to the My Shoes feature! Add your shoe and log its use every time you track an activity—we'll tell you when it's time to get a new pair!
You can now also record and send your own Cheer when someone you follow has Live Tracking turned on. Hurrah!

creator: Adidas Runtastic
descriptionHtml:
Join the fitness community with adidas Running, the complete sports, fitness and activity tracker to log multiple sports seamlessly. adidas Running is the perfect all-in-one run tracker, biking companion, and workout app. Discover more than 90 sports and activities that you can track when you download adidas Running today!

Join over 170m people who use adidas Running every day for their walks, runs, and overall fitness. Track your fitness activity with ease as you complete your exercise routines, marathon training or cycling trips.

Reach your fitness goals by staying motivated through regular challenges and virtual races.

Keep a log of minutes, km and calories burned and see your statistics. Get better as you go, follow other athletes and join sport clubs around you to keep yourself moving!

Download adidas Running today for the ultimate running app, bike tracker, and overall fitness companion.

adidas Running Features

THE APP FOR ALL ACTIVITIES
- Choose from 90+ sports and activities
- Hike, walk, run and more - Take adidas Running for any activity
- Monitor your fitness and log your heart rate with our health monitor
- Sport and activity goals are in reach with adidas Running

ACTIVITY & RUN TRACKER
- Track walks, cycling trips, and even your next hike
- Monitor health and fitness with a heart rate, pace, cadence and calorie tracker
- Track your fitness and check progress as you improve
- Enjoy convenient running app features as you plan run distance, duration, and consistency

WEAR OS COMPATIBILITY
- Link your adidas Running account to your favorite wearable device for a personal health monitor
- Weight loss and daily fitness progress monitoring at your disposal
- Improve overall health and fitness with convenient insight on all your devices

HALF-MARATHON & MARATHON TRAINING (PREMIUM)
- With a running coach and detailed tools, you can focus on the run that matters
- Walk to Run adidas Training Plan adapts to your level so you can prepare for the next 5K
- Build a running plan that's personalized to your needs - available to all members

MORE PREMIUM BENEFITS
- Run plans for 5k, 10k, marathons or weight loss. Receive personalized training for races
- Personal running coach - Interval training for running, walking and cycling
- Personal records to mark all your achievements
- Auto-pause when you stop moving

**Available on mobile, Wear OS, and other wearable devices. Two tiles are supported in Wear OS: a statistics tile to see your progress over the past six months and a launch tile to quick start a specific sport type. We also support three different complications: Start Activity, Weekly Distance, and Number of Weekly Activities.

APP USAGE INFO & PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP DETAILS

The adidas Running app by Runtastic is free to download & use. Some features, such as your running training plans, are unlocked only with the purchase of a Premium Membership. Your Membership renews automatically if you do not cancel it within 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. The renewal of your Premium Membership will be charged to your account up to 24 hours before your current Membership expires. The cancellation of an in-app Membership subscription is not permitted. The option to disable the automatic renewal of your Premium Membership is available to you in your Google Play account settings.
